Lizzy Mercier Descloux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lizzy_Mercier_Descloux 0 Martine-Elisabeth Mercier Descloux (16 December 1956 – 20 April 2004) was a French musician, singer-songwriter, composer, actress, writer and painter. Martine-Elisabeth_Mercier_Descloux ( 16_December_1956 – 20_April_2004 ) was a_French_musician , singer-songwriter_,_composer_,_actress_,_writer_and_painter .
